DOC.brief_title: IES-ACap: Influence of Atrial Pulse Width in the Behaviour of ACap™ Confirm Algorithm.
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this observational study is to collect data regarding the population of patients whit a Zephyr™ pacemaker implanted, models 5826 and 5820, and active or passive fixation leads , when the Algorithms Acap Confirm, which automatically regulates the Atrial Pulse Width, is enabled.
DOC.criteria: Patient has an indication for implantation of a dualchamber pacemaker; Patient is older than 18 years of age Patient has signed the study specific Informed consent document. Primo implant. Patient is pregnant or nursing Patient is less than 18 years of age Patient is in New York Heart Association (NYHA) class III and IV. Patient has a pacemaker replacement; Patient is unable to attend the followup visits;
